FEEP-MAPPING.SQL: SELECT feep_table.id, feep_table.name, feep_table.showname, feep_table.tabletype, feep_table.description, feep_table.datasourceid, feep_tablefield.id tablefieldid, feep_tablefield.name tablefieldname, feep_tablefield.showname tablefieldshowname, feep_tablefield.datatype, feep_tablefield.range, feep_tablefield.precision, feep_tablefield.isnotnull, feep_tablefield.isunique, feep_tablefield.tableid FROM feep_table feep_table LEFT JOIN feep_tablefield feep_tablefield ON feep_table.id = feep_tablefield.tableid WHERE feep_table.id = ?
SELECT id, NAME, showname, tabletype, description, datasourceid FROM feep_table WHERE
